label: Counterfeit Detection
description: Products and services related to detecting counterfeit money and goods.
intents: Verify authenticity of money or goods

subcategories.label: Counterfeit Detection Pens
subcategories.description: Pens that detect counterfeit money by marking it with special ink.
subtopics: How to use a counterfeit detection pen

subcategories.label: UV Lights and Pens
subcategories.description: Lights and pens that detect counterfeit money by revealing hidden features under UV light.
subtopics: How to use a UV counterfeit detector

subcategories.label: Money Counters
subcategories.description: Machines that count and sort money.
subtopics: How to use a money counter

subcategories.label: Banknote Detectors
subtopics: How to use a banknote detector

subcategories.label: Forgery Detection Machines
subtopics: How to use a forgery detector
